definition: to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to row/to paddle/profitable/worth (the effort)/it pays (to do sth)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character

sentences.english: December 2, the city's overall urban planning to modify the mobilization of the session.
sentences.chinese: 12月2日，全市城市总体规划修改动员大会召开。

sentences.english: Take the lead in Taizhou of Jiangsu Province City pilot compiled an overall land use planning.
sentences.chinese: 率先在江苏省泰州市试点编制土地利用总体规划。

sentences.english: The paper introduces the overall plan of bamboo garden in Nanxiong city.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍了南雄市竹博园总体规划。

sentences.english: Overall Planning and Design of Minjiang Estuary National Wetland Park in Changle, Fujian has been completed.
sentences.chinese: 已完成福建长乐闽江河口国家湿地公园总体规划设计。

sentences.english: The river crossing at the Yangtze Estuary is an important component in the overall plan of Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 长江口越江通道是上海城市总体规划的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: One, we need to conscientiously follow the general plan and annual plan for land use.
sentences.chinese: 一要认真执行土地利用总体规划和年度计划。

sentences.english: Make a master plan for developing high-standard farmland in the country.
sentences.chinese: 制定实施全国高标准农田建设总体规划。

sentences.english: Overall plan for the park RTKL senior experts from the United States will see.
sentences.chinese: 园区总体规划由美国RTKL资深专家担纲。

sentences.english: The paper analyzes the necessity of introducing bidding mechanism in the whole urban planning in Yuncheng City.
sentences.chinese: 本文分析了运城市城市总体规划引入招标制的必要性。

sentences.english: The overall planning of water, and culture themes implement the whole case.
sentences.chinese: 总体规划以水文化为主题展开，并贯彻全案。

sentences.english: Coastal Tourism Master Plan has received a formal city approval.
sentences.chinese: 滨海旅游区总体规划日前获得市政府正式批复。

sentences.english: Once approved, the general plans for the land use shall be implemented strictly.
sentences.chinese: 土地利用总体规划一经批准，必须严格执行。

sentences.english: "Overall Planning of the Development of Tourism in Deqin County Yunnan Province";
sentences.chinese: 《辽宁省盘锦市旅游业发展总体规划》等。

sentences.english: to check the contents on environmental protection in overall city plans.
sentences.chinese: 审核城市总体规划中的环境保护内容。

sentences.english: The paper enquires into the applicability of the optimum linear plan method to masterplan for land utilization.
sentences.chinese: 探讨最优线性规划法对土地利用总体规划的适用性。

sentences.english: We would launch with only three percent of our total plans.
sentences.chinese: 我们只实现了总体规划的百分之三。

definition: land use plan (official P.R.C. government term)
